rows.label: bf05100100_0010
rows.name:
I've never seen anything like this.
A tunnel through the clouds...

rows.label: bf05100100_0020
rows.name:
It's because this archipelago is formed
of many smaller Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf05100100_0030
rows.name:
The forces between the Divine Beasts bend
the Cloud Sea into this shape.

rows.label: bf05100100_0040
rows.name:
There is a large Divine Beast as well,
at the center of the cloud mountains.

rows.label: bf05100100_0050
rows.name:
Though being within the Cloud Sea itself,
you won't find humans living on it.

rows.label: bf05100100_0060
rows.name:
The small Divine Beasts seem to like clustering around the
larger one, and that's what forms the archipelago.

rows.label: bf05100100_0070
rows.name:
Wow... So many amazing things to
see in world!

rows.label: bf05100100_0080
rows.name: Masterpon should get out more often.

rows.label: bf05100100_0090
rows.name: Working inside all day bad for mind and body, you know.

rows.label: bf05100100_0100
rows.name: Tora on wonderful adventure with boss right now though!

rows.label: bf05100100_0110
rows.name: Days of staying inside all day are long gone!

rows.label: bf05100100_0120
rows.name:
Yeah. You're a Driver just like
us now, Tora.

rows.label: bf05100100_0130
rows.name: Mehmeh! Tora appreciate support from friend Rex-Rex!
